title: The Cell: a functioning structure. Pt. 2
creator_credit: CRM Educational Films and Steven Katten
brief_description: Uses cinemicroscopy and animation to show chemical events which take place within the living cell. Describes genetic code and DNA and the role of RNA. Also discusses the chloroplast of the plant cell and investigates cellular communications. Features Dr Donald Fosket. Hosted and narrated by Dr David Suzuki.
